line.comment: To reach the next level, you must use your [color=dim]mining laser[/color]! Press [color=dim]@dig-left[/color] to dig to the [color=dim]left[/color], or press [color=dim]@dig-right[/color] to dig to the [color=dim]right[/color]. You can also press [color=dim]@dig-forward[/color] to dig in the direction your character is currently facing.

You might notice that you cannot dig directly beneath a [color=dim]ladder[/color]. Aside from that limitation, you can dig [color=dim]wherever[/color] you want, [color=dim]whenever[/color] you want. You will never run out of "ammo!"
Remember that you can return to previous levels at any time.
